entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Strange perfomance loss when using conditional Vector<T> and CopyBlockUnaligned #76844
  • Inconsistent inlining of IndexOfAny vs IndexOfAnyExcept helpers #76843
  • BigInteger ModPow or aritchmeric within internal buffer handling #76842
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload to Debugger.Launch() that accepts a conditional expression #76840
  • Test failure in System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.* tests #76836
    8.0.0
  • Running tests in Release try to call testhost dotnet.exe from Debug folder #76834
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.WriteCanceled_NextWriteThrows test failure #76831
    8.0.0
  • [tvOS][test] System.Runtime.Extensions BitOperationsTests BitOps_Crc32C_byte crash #76830
  • JSON source generator emits CS0612 warnings if serialized types use [Obsolete] #76829
  • Serialization of `ReadOnlyMemory<byte>` with `[JsonIgnore]` attribute in .NET 6 and .NET 7 RC1 #76807
    7.0.0
  • [Blazor WASM] Unable to run method 'void BuildRenderTreeMicrosoft.AspNetCore.Components.Rendering.RenderTreeBuilder)': locals size too big. #76808
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Assertion at sgen-stw.c:77, condition not met #76805
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json code generation fails on recursive IReadOnlyDictionary #76802
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed: (*card_word)==0 in DynamicGenerics tests #76801

Closed

  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953.sh #76845
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Then method to Task-like types #76839
  • Json.Deserialize System.Net.Mail; #76798
  • new Vector<T> for byte, short emits vpbroadcastd thus needs an imul #67038
    8.0.0
  • GeneratorRun_WithNewCompilation_DoesNotKeepOldCompilationAlive failed in CI #76826
  • This is a duplicate of https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/58692. #76841
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException: at System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.set_SecureSocketLayer in docker container #65726
    Future
  • LINQ Usage Survey #76205
    8.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.Intrinsics #72402
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] could not create compact unwind for _S_P_CoreLib_System_Number__Dragon4: stack subq instruction is too different from dwarf stack size #76814
  • Assertion failed 'child->OperIs(GT_AND) || child->OperIsCmpCompare()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #76566
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allocate blittable objects on stack memory #76787
  • System.Text.Json Serializer ignores JsonIgnore when generating JsonTypeInfo #76794
  • Support for ISO8601 durations in TimeSpan #28862
    Future
  • crossgen/llc --help is malformed #76770
    8.0.0
  • Uri.TryCreate returns different results on Windows and Linux #76816
  • AssemblyLoadContext failed to unload assembly #76809
  • A DateTime.ToString with CultureInfo("nb-NO") gives the wrong datetime string output on iOS #76596
    8.0.0
  • [mono] System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (98): Address in use #76806
  • `System.InsufficientExecutionStackException` when using Mono on `linux-musl` #76523

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Bump intellisense to include latest docs for RC2 #76847
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Bump intellisense to include latest docs for RC2 #76846
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions (#76376) #76838
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Don't generate a nearly empty file #76835
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Reduce CoreCLR PAL #76832
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Ensure reflection property metadata is instantiated lazily #76828
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add new `runtime-wasm-features` pipeline #76822
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add {Last}IndexOfAny{Except}InRange #76803
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Use property AutoreleasePoolSupport in test #76800
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution

Merged

  • ZipArchive.CreateEntry: include file type in default ExternalAttributes. #76059
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [interpreter] Treat methods with the Intrinsic attribute as if they have AggressiveInlining set #76475
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, MonoInterpreter=true
  • Fixing repro command line arguments #76820
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Disable NativeAOT subset for source-build. #76206
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • SPMI: Return recorded base instrumentation data address #76765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Split out call importation into new importercalls.cpp #76792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix MetadataLoadContext Readme #76778
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Fix converting old SIMD ctors to HWI ones #71865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add basic test for `PrintDocument.Print` using the default print controller #76752
    area-System.Drawing
  • Only run Compilation liveness test on platforms with precise GC. #76827
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Some SIMD-related cleanup #73819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: import static readonly fields holding frozen objects as const handles #76112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Base64.Decode: fixed latent bug for non-ASCII inputs #76795
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Revert "Remove closed issues from issues.targets (#75363)" #76819
  • [release/7.0] Base64.Decode: fixed latent bug for non-ASCII inputs #76812
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory
  • Correct error messages for CoreCLR Win32 PAL uses in CoreLib #76768
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove more PAL exports for `wprintf` `wscanf` funcs #76771
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Correct error messages for CoreCLR Win32 PAL uses in CoreLib #76813
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions #76376
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • Improve perf of Enumerable.Order{Descending} for primitives #76733
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Combine AsSpan().Slice(...) calls into AsSpan(...) #76799
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] Properly handle filesizes larger than 8 Gb #76756
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix help formatting in cg2/ilc #76772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Vector128's Sum and Dot SIMD implementation #76446
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add VMR attributes to preserve empty PDB files #76810
    area-Infrastructure
  • DateTime: Use Optimised Equals Implementation in object.Equals() #76559
    community-contribution
  • Use IndexOf to find closing quote in WarningHeaderValue #76804
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Devirtualize EqualityComparer for reference types #76714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Preference locals away from PUTARG_REG killed registers #76671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Implement next part of PackedSimd class #76539
    new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix Vector documentation #74701
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Port SpanHelpers.SequenceCompareTo(ref byte, int, ref byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73475
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • API Debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #76692
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix loop canonicalization for call-finally case #76734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove libstdc++ dependency from NativeAOT #76705
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [test][tvos] Disable InvalidIVSizes overflow case for tvos #76725
    area-System.Security, os-tvos
  • JIT: Use metadata names for SIMD intrinsic method recognition #76786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add null check before calling Path.GetFullPath #76696
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add option for truncated stream detection #75671
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fixing PhysicalFilesWatcher path maintenance (Issue #71386) #72041
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Vectorize (Last)IndexOfAny(Except) for ASCII needles #76740
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Add specific formatting string for SSA numbers #76706
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JitDisasm cosmetic improvements #75425
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.IO
  • Split and simplify `fgMorphOneAsgBlockOp` #76793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold primitive-typed access to promoted structs in local morph and forbid mismatched struct assignments #76766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugger behavior when the type has ToString method overridden #76780
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Use hashcodes when looking up the JsonSerializerOptions global cache. #76782
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 #75648
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness for spans of elements #76339
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ReadOnly{Observable}Collection/Dictionary.Empty #76764
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System.Runtime.Intrinsics #76687
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Add matrix for libraries tests on coreclr change #69706
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, Future
  • Include hostcommon sources in hostfxr static library #75858
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • JIT: Slightly relax "const vector propagation" heuristics #76788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Test against iOS 16 and MacOS Ventura #74809
    NO-MERGE
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Abs intrinsics for Amd64 #76668
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve performance of integer formatting #76726
    area-System.Runtime
  • [wasm-mt] When workers resize the heap, instanceof SharedArrayBuffer may be false #76760
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Smarter ordering of late args based on register uses #76017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Optimize out some ldloca uses #76669
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Don't check handles in substitution #76730
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold full-width SIMD-typed indirections #76745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #76743
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • MemoryExtensions.Replace(Span<T>, T, T) implemented #76337
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable visual styles for host error dialog via activation context #76762
    area-Host

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • web api An error occurs when visiting a website. How do you locate the error? #2024

PullRequests

Created

  • remove installer leg requirement #2026

Updated

  • Make FCall transition go through lambda that can be translated into a functionpointer + pointer arg parameter #2019
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Add support for GT_STORE_BLK #2005

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Re-enable blazor tests in 6.0 after 17.4 msbuild fix is in #28429
  • AL1012: 'arm64' is not a valid setting for option 'platform' #28419

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28440
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add actionable output to templating destructive changes notification #28428
    Area-dotnet new
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Reference net7.0 version of msbuild for source-build #28425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use latest docker containers #28422
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28438
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Expand existing EOL warning to target 5.0 #27943
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.110
  • Update windows images for release/6.0.1xx #28194
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28437
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 6.0.1xx branding and test disablement #28430
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid extra copies of dotnet-watch build outputs in the SDK directory #27964
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2016280 #28424
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] backport APICompat changes for GA #28404
    Servicing-approved, Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Baseline Update for 6.0.306 #28346
  • Update branding to 6.0.403 #28324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.306 #28323
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2016612 #27667
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • Improve the example with specified language when language option is given with invalid option #28135
    Area-dotnet new
  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT variable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure, feature-dotnetwatch, Area-CLI, Area-Watch
  • [8.0 -> 7.0.2 Backport] Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28376
    Review for breaking changes
  • Add an official builder assembly attribute #28400
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28398
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28397
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Confusing behavior of "Go to definition", "Peek definition" and "Go to implementation" with partial methods #64615
    17.5
  • Support .NET 6 ServiceHub host on ARM64 VS #64610
    17.5
  • C# async functions hold onto memory beyond lifetime of function #64607
  • Obsolete-Attribute with interpolated string as message does not raise warnings #64605
    17.5
  • Recursive lambda reference crashes nullable analysis #64599
    17.5
  • Roslyn expression compiler is unable to emit code with pattern-matched properties/fields for debugger evaluator #64598
  • Not offered to "Extract Method" when resulting method produces two values #64597
    17.5 P1
  • Constant evaluation is not IEEE-754 compliant #64595

Closed

  • Ref and in parameters used in ternary vs if statement #64224
  • Out vars should get their safe-to-escape scope from their declaring expression #22361
    Compiler.Next
  • Incorrect scoped lifetime inference for out locals #64394
    17.5
  • BC30064 when assigning a value to a ReadOnly variable in the constructor inside a With block #63807
  • Compiler unnecessarily guards readonly object when locking. #64178
  • Non-exhaustive switch expression w/ tuple deconstruction causes csc.exe to fail with exit code -2146232797 #64370
  • Code that compiles on dotnet 6 gives compile errors on dotnet 7 preview #64000
    17.4
  • build is slow, any suggestions? #63522
  • Visual Studio 2022's new rename box leads into forgetting "Rename symbol's file"-option after renaming non-symbol like variable, namespace and other #63181
    17.4
  • Getting CS8168 and CS8350 in .NET 7 RC1 for code that compiled on .NET 7 preview 7 and .NET 6 #64421
  • Source generator MissingMethodException GeneratorExecutionContext AdditionalFiles #64430
  • incorrect error CS1525 when CS1026 is expected #64440
  • ITypeSymbol AllInterfaces not reporting code generated Interfaces in some cases #64447
  • 'CSharpDeclareAsNullableCodeFixProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled #64515
  • UnscopedRef ref returning method acts differently than its property counterpart #64606
  • Edit > Refactor > Extract Interface no longer creates an interface #64611
    17.5
  • No type completion after `required` modifier #64585
  • StringSyntaxAttribute for params arguments only highlight the first argument #64549
    17.5
  • MSBuildWorkspace creates documents with wrong checksum algorithm #51993
    Backlog
  • Roslyn could not load assembly when a reference is added and InvokeMember method is used. #64462

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround crash in spellchecking in snippet layer #64622
    Area-IDE
  • Set val escape on expression variables (#64414) #64621
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove lock from MAS code to prevent UI delays #64620
    Area-IDE
  • Catch deconstruction ref escape errors in invocation escape analysis (#64470) #64619
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.4
  • Include preview version when installing .NET runtime #64618
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Test flaky tests #64617
    Area-IDE
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in DesignerAttributeScanning as well. #64616
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64613
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix early attribute decoding when an argument is interpolated string #64612
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Experiment with removing SerializableSourceText #64609
    Area-IDE
  • Name anonymous delegate parameters #64604
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix nullable walker cycle #64600
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow reordering parameters, inserting, and deleting parameters #64596
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Set val escape on expression variables #64414
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64614
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Track EA APIs #64487
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Catch deconstruction ref escape errors in invocation escape analysis #64470
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Update NavigateTo tests to support AllInOneSearch #64582
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix DecodeForwardIteratorRecord to accept strings w/o null terminator #64349
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • [LSP] Fix race during shutdown and exit #64583
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Beef up resiliency of DeclareAsNullable fixer #64555
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable rich LSIF hover information. #64580
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Treat *.g.i.cs|vb files as design-time-only in EnC #64575
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, 17.4 P4
  • Build and run tests on .NET 7 #64560
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Use required members for option types #64405
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64608
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix symbol completions after `required` keyword #64593
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix regex detection for StringSyntax attribute on params parameters #64553
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use the source-built version of ref packs and don't use app host when building in source-build #64055
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Utility for uploading artifact on test failure #64578
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Enable already-fixed test #64603
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64584
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64591
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64590
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Do not use CWT for Task<Compilation> #64623
    Area-IDE
  • Change operator when negating relational patterns with numeric values #64594
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64424
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in NavigateTo OOP calls. #64576
    Area-IDE
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Respond to missed feedback #64513
    Area-IDE
  • Remove exportProvider parameter from TestWorkspace ctor #64221
    Area-IDE
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Remove TextDocumentState.sourceText #64231
    Area-IDE
  • Check value scopes match in ref reassignment #64561
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Disable Windows PDB conversion #64581
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Extend test coverage for lambda default parameters #64530
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exception Handler handling OperationCanceledException but not getting expected HTTP response #44460
  • Please release new version of Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Abstraction #44457
  • Perf regression: plaintext_actix #44455
  • Perf improvement: json, mvc #44454
  • QuickGrid documentation insufficiency #44446
    8.0-MQ
  • Will property injection be revisited with the upcoming addition of required members? #44445
  • Curious what is the drawback of removing the reference of _framework/blazor.server.js from my blazor server project? #44444
  • Blazor server doesn't render pages properly with custom WebApplicationOptions #44439
    .NET 8 Planning
  • URL based localization in Blazor application #44438
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • Problem with slow loading of static files such as js in .NET 6.0.8 and IIS 10 web application #44255
  • StartupAnalyzerTest tests are not running and all have test failures #44306
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor CSS Isolation Issue only on certain pages #44267
  • Perf regression: json #44419
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json_netty #44434
  • Perf regression: fortunes #44436
  • Refreshing Cookie Authentication Cookie Issue with HttpClient Causes Weird Caching Issue #44427

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Add VS.Redist project for ANCM #44459
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Update protobuf version #44450
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44447
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix invalid redirection after 2FA sign-in (#44395) #44435
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Generate VS.Redist package for ANCM #39140
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix Startup analyzer tests #44453
    8.0-preview1
  • [3.1] Update protobuf version #44452
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.31
  • [7.0] Update protobuf version #44451
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `93f08be` to `9fbb657` #44440
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `9bd1b05` to `f268fbf` #44441
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44416
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Avoid double dispatch by default on HTTP.sys #44409
    Perf, area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Generate VS.Redist package for ANCM #44369
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure
  • update triageprocess.md for .NET 8 #44421
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2016328 #43956
    blocked, area-infrastructure
